doc:
Jeremy Piven https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jeremy_Piven 0 Jeremy Samuel Piven (born July 26, 1965) is an American actor, comedian, and producer. He is known for his role as Ari Gold in the comedy series Entourage, for which he won a Golden Globe Award and three consecutive Emmy Awards. He also starred in the British period drama Mr Selfridge, which tells the story of the man who created the luxury English department store chain Selfridges, and portrayed Spence Kovak on Ellen DeGeneres's sitcom Ellen. Jeremy_Samuel_Piven ( born July_26_,_1965 ) is an_American_actor , comedian , and producer . He is_known for his_role as Ari_Gold in the_comedy_series_Entourage , for which he won a_Golden_Globe_Award and three_consecutive_Emmy_Awards . He also starred in the_British_period_drama_Mr_Selfridge , which tells the_story of the_man who created the_luxury_English_department_store_chain_Selfridges , and portrayed Spence_Kovak on Ellen_DeGeneres 's_sitcom_Ellen .
